artist: Shūtoku; Inscribed by Yōkoku Kentō; Inscribed by Teihō Shōchū
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: jagged, towering rock formations at R with waterfall and gnarled pine trees; small pavilion on shore at lower center with fishing boat nearby; small footbridge connects two shores across a small channel with trees at L; bluish mountains in background; inscriptions ULQ
marks: ULQ (Yōkoku Kentō): 西泊春來雖水肥　碧湘門外掩船扉　東風若為斯郎便　一髮吳霜棹月 ULQ: 佳境甘蔗道人乾瞳 {Kakyō Kansho Dōjin Kentō}; ULQ (abo
medium: Hanging scroll; ink and light color on paper
title: Early Spring Landscape
